FETCH_ALL_POKEMON: query FetchAllPokemon { pokemon_v2_pokemon { id name pokemon_v2_pokemontypes { pokemon_v2_type { name } } pokemon_v2_pokemonspecy { pokemon_v2_pokemonspeciesnames(where: { pokemon_v2_language: { name: { _in: ["fr","en"] } } } ) { name pokemon_v2_language { name } } } } }
FETCH_ALL_GENERATIONS: query FetchAllGenerations {pokemon_v2_generation { id name pokemon_v2_generationnames(where: {pokemon_v2_language: {name: {_in: ["fr", "en"]}}}) { name pokemon_v2_language { name } } pokemon_v2_pokemonspecies_aggregate { aggregate { min { id } max { id } } } pokemon_v2_region { name pokemon_v2_regionnames(where: {pokemon_v2_language: {name: {_in: ["fr", "en"]}}}) { name pokemon_v2_language { name } } } pokemon_v2_versiongroups { name pokemon_v2_versions { name pokemon_v2_versionnames(where: {pokemon_v2_language: {name: {_in: ["fr", "en"]}}}) { name pokemon_v2_language { name } } } pokemon_v2_pokedexversiongroups { pokedex_id pokemon_v2_pokedex {name}}} } }
FETCH_MOVES_COUNT_PER_GEN: query FetchAllMoves { pokemon_v2_generation { id name pokemon_v2_moves { id name power accuracy pp pokemon_v2_movedamageclass { name } pokemon_v2_type { name } pokemon_v2_movenames(where: {pokemon_v2_language: {name: {_in: ["fr", "en"]}}}) { pokemon_v2_language { name } name } } } }
FETCH_ALL_MOVES: query fetchAllMoves { pokemon_v2_move { id generation_id name power accuracy pp priority pokemon_v2_movedamageclass { name } pokemon_v2_moveeffect { pokemon_v2_moveeffecteffecttexts(where: {pokemon_v2_language: {name: {_in: ["fr", "en"]}}}) { effect short_effect } } pokemon_v2_movechanges { move_effect_chance accuracy power pp pokemon_v2_type { name } } pokemon_v2_machines { machine_number pokemon_v2_versiongroup { name } } pokemon_v2_type { name } pokemon_v2_movetarget { name } pokemon_v2_movenames(where: {pokemon_v2_language: {name: {_in: ["fr", "en"]}}}) { name } pokemon_v2_moveattributemaps { pokemon_v2_moveattribute { name } } } }
FETCH_ALL_ABILITIES: query FetchAllAbilities { pokemon_v2_ability { id name generation_id pokemon_v2_abilitynames(where: {pokemon_v2_language: {name: {_in: ["fr", "en"]}}}) { pokemon_v2_language { name } name } pokemon_v2_abilityflavortexts_aggregate(where: {pokemon_v2_language: {name: {_in: ["fr", "en"]}}}, distinct_on: language_id, order_by: {}) { nodes { flavor_text pokemon_v2_language { name } } } } }
FETCH_ALL_ITEMS_PER_GEN: query FetchAllItems { pokemon_v2_itempocket { pokemon_v2_itempocketnames(where: {pokemon_v2_language: {name: {_in: ["fr", "en"]}}}) { name pokemon_v2_language { name } } pokemon_v2_itemcategories { pokemon_v2_itemcategorynames(where: {pokemon_v2_language: {name: {_in: ["fr", "en"]}}}) { name pokemon_v2_language { name } } pokemon_v2_items { id pokemon_v2_itemnames(where: {pokemon_v2_language: {name: {_in: ["fr", "en"]}}}) { name pokemon_v2_language { name } } pokemon_v2_itemgameindices_aggregate { aggregate { min { generation_id } } } } } } }
FETCH_ALL_LOCATIONS_PER_VERSIONS: query FetchAllLocations { pokemon_v2_versiongroup { generation_id name pokemon_v2_versiongroupregions { id pokemon_v2_region { name pokemon_v2_locations { name pokemon_v2_locationareas { name id pokemon_v2_locationareanames(where: {pokemon_v2_language: {name: {_in: ["fr", "en"]}}}) { name pokemon_v2_language { name } } } } } } } }
